languages.text: "Однако мы все еще можем реквизировать суда. Вот только на Футфоле не нашлось корабля с достаточно мощными {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}авгурами{/g}, чтобы обнаружить еретика. Ваш же флагман обладает продвинутыми технологиями и внушительной огневой силой. Даю слово, будь в доках подходящее судно, я бы не стал тревожить вас".

"However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."
languages.original_text: "Однако мы все еще можем реквизировать суда. Вот только на Футфоле не нашлось корабля с достаточно мощными {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}авгурами{/g}, чтобы обнаружить еретика. Ваш же флагман обладает продвинутыми технологиями и внушительной огневой силой. Даю слово, будь в доках подходящее судно, я бы не стал тревожить вас".

traits.locale_text: "However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with augurs powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

"However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with augurs powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

"However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

"However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

languages.text: «Sin embargo, aún podemos requisar naves. El problema es que no hay ninguna nave en Paso con {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} lo bastante avanzados como para localizar al hereje. Su nave insignia, en cambio, cuenta con una excelente tecnología y una potencia de fuego impresionante. Le aseguro que, de haber una opción apropiada en el puerto, no l{mf|e|a} importunaría con este asunto».
languages.original_text: "However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, aún podemos requisar naves. El problema es que no hay ninguna nave en Paso con augures lo bastante avanzados como para localizar al hereje. Su nave insignia, en cambio, cuenta con una excelente tecnología y una potencia de fuego impresionante. Le aseguro que, de haber una opción apropiada en el puerto, no l{mf|e|a} importunaría con este asunto».

languages.text: “虽然我们可以征用舰船，但落脚港其他舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}俄歇{/g}矩阵功率不足，无法追踪那个异端分子的位置。相比之下，你的旗舰拥有非常先进的设备，火力也非常强大。我可以向你保证，如果落脚港的码头还有其他合适的船可以征用，我断然不会用这种事情来麻烦你。”
languages.original_text: "However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

traits.locale_text: “虽然我们可以征用舰船，但落脚港其他舰船的俄歇矩阵功率不足，无法追踪那个异端分子的位置。相比之下，你的旗舰拥有非常先进的设备，火力也非常强大。我可以向你保证，如果落脚港的码头还有其他合适的船可以征用，我断然不会用这种事情来麻烦你。”

languages.text: « Nous pouvons toujours réquisitionner des vaisseaux, mais aucun appareil à Castel n'est équipé d'{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augures{/g} assez puissants pour remonter la piste de ce misérable. En revanche, votre vaisseau amiral bénéficie d'une technologie ultra sophistiquée et d'une puissance de feu considérable. Croyez-moi, si j'avais pu trouver mon bonheur au port, je ne serais pas ici à l'heure actuelle. »
languages.original_text: "However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

traits.locale_text: « Nous pouvons toujours réquisitionner des vaisseaux, mais aucun appareil à Castel n'est équipé d'augures assez puissants pour remonter la piste de ce misérable. En revanche, votre vaisseau amiral bénéficie d'une technologie ultra sophistiquée et d'une puissance de feu considérable. Croyez-moi, si j'avais pu trouver mon bonheur au port, je ne serais pas ici à l'heure actuelle. »

languages.text: 「私たちはまだ船を徴発できますが、フットフォールには異端者を追跡するのに十分強力な{g|Encyclopedia:Augur}オーガー{/g}を有する船はありません。一方、あなたの旗艦は先進的な技術と驚異的な火力を誇っています。もし波止場に適切な船があれば、本件についてあなたにお手間を取らせることはなかったに違いありません」
languages.original_text: "However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはまだ船を徴発できますが、フットフォールには異端者を追跡するのに十分強力なオーガーを有する船はありません。一方、あなたの旗艦は先進的な技術と驚異的な火力を誇っています。もし波止場に適切な船があれば、本件についてあなたにお手間を取らせることはなかったに違いありません」

languages.text: "Hâlâ gemi talep edebiliriz ancak Binliman'da, kâfirin izini sürebilecek kuvvete sahip {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}alametleri{/g} olan hiç gemi yok. Sizin sancak geminiz ise ileri teknolojilere ve etkileyici bir ateş gücüne sahip. Emin olun rıhtımda uygun gemi olsa sizi bu konuda rahatsız etmezdim."
languages.original_text: "However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."

traits.locale_text: "Hâlâ gemi talep edebiliriz ancak Binliman'da, kâfirin izini sürebilecek kuvvete sahip alametleri olan hiç gemi yok. Sizin sancak geminiz ise ileri teknolojilere ve etkileyici bir ateş gücüne sahip. Emin olun rıhtımda uygun gemi olsa sizi bu konuda rahatsız etmezdim."

languages.text: "Wir sind natürlich befugt, Schiffe zu requirieren. Allerdings gibt es auf Footfall kein Schiff, dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}Auguren{/g} mächtig genug sind, um den Ketzer aufzuspüren. Euer Flaggschiff verfügt indes über modernste Technologien und eine beeindruckende Feuerkraft. Ich versichere Euch, wenn es in den Docks ein geeignetes Schiff gäbe, würde ich Euch nicht mit dieser Angelegenheit behelligen."
languages.original_text: "However, we can still requisition vessels. But there is no ship on Footfall with {g|Encyclopedia:Augur}augurs{/g} powerful enough to track down the heretic. Your flagship, on the other hand, boasts advanced technology and impressive firepower. I assure you, if there were a suitable vessel at the docks, I would not be troubling you with this matter."
